item.title: House Republicans brush off Stefanik's Trump admin upheaval amid high-stakes Florida race
item.description: House Republican leaders are dismissing speculation that they have been anxious over three GOP-favored congressional districts in recent weeks.

item.title: Conservative backlash erupts after Trump's Graham endorsement: 'I am not with Trump at all with this one'
